00019 #ifndef PACKAGE_H
00020 #define PACKAGE_H
00021 
00022 #include "gluk_macros.h"
00023 #include <QString>
00024 #include <QStringList>
00025 #include <QFlags>
00026 
00032 class GLUK_EXPORT Package
00033 {
00034 public:
00039     enum Attribute {
00040                Invalid = 0x0, 
00041                New = 0x1, 
00042                Slotted = 0x2, 
00043                Updating = 0x4, 
00044                Downgrading = 0x8, 
00045                Reinstalling = 0x16, 
00046                FetchRestrictionManualDownload = 0x32, 
00047                FetchRestrictionAlreadyDownloaded = 0x64, 
00048                Interactive = 0x128, 
00049                BlockedUnresolved = 0x256, 
00050                BlockedAutomaticallyResolved = 0x512 
00051     };
00052     Q_DECLARE_FLAGS(Attributes, Attribute)
00053 
00054     ~Package();
00055 
00059     QString packageName();
00060 
00064     QStringList useFlags();
00065 
00069     QString size();
00070 
00074     Attributes attributes();
00075 
00076 private:
00077     friend class PortageEngine;
00078     Package() : m_attributes(Invalid) {}
00079 
00080     QString m_name;
00081     QStringList m_useFlags;
00083     QString m_size;
00084     Attributes m_attributes;
00085 };
00086 
00087 Q_DECLARE_OPERATORS_FOR_FLAGS(Package::Attributes)
00088 
00089 #endif
